mapper.insert: /* FileDao.addFile */ INSERT INTO TB_FILE ( FILEGRPID, FILE_IDNTFC_KEY, FILE_PATH, SAVE_FILE_NM, ORGINL_FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN, FILE_SIZE, ORD, UPDT_DT, UPDTUSERID, REG_DT, REGUSERID ) VALUES ( #{filegrpid}, #{fileIdntfcKey}, #{filePath}, #{saveFileNm}, #{orginlFileNm}, #{fileExtsn}, #{fileSize}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ORD),0) +1 FROM TB_FILE AS F WHERE 1=1 AND filegrpid = #{filegrpid} ), NOW(), #{reguserid}, NOW(), #{reguserid} )
mapper.select: /* FileDao.selectFile */ SELECT A.FILEID, A.FILEGRPID, A.FILE_IDNTFC_KEY, B.FILEGRP_NM, B.BBSID, C.NLOGIN_PERM_YN, A.FILE_PATH, A.SAVE_FILE_NM, A.ORGINL_FILE_NM, A.FILE_EXTSN, A.FILE_SIZE, A.ORD, A.REG_DT, A.REGUSERID FROM TB_FILE A ,TB_FILEGRP B LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BBS C ON B.BBSID = C.BBSID WHERE 1=1 AND A.FILEGRPID = B.FILEGRPID AND A.FILEID = #{fileid} AND A.FILE_IDNTFC_KEY = #{fileIdntfcKey}

/* FileDao.selectFileInfo */ SELECT TOP 1 A.FILEID, A.FILEGRPID, A.FILE_IDNTFC_KEY, B.FILEGRP_NM, A.FILE_PATH, A.SAVE_FILE_NM, A.ORGINL_FILE_NM, A.FILE_EXTSN, A.FILE_SIZE, A.ORD, A.REG_DT, A.REGUSERID FROM TB_FILE A ,TB_FILEGRP B WHERE 1=1 AND A.FILEGRPID = B.FILEGRPID AND A.FILEGRPID = #{filegrpid}

/* FileDao.selectOldFileList */ SELECT A.FILEID, A.FILEGRPID, A.FILE_IDNTFC_KEY, B.FILEGRP_NM, A.FILE_PATH, A.SAVE_FILE_NM, A.ORGINL_FILE_NM, A.FILE_EXTSN, A.FILE_SIZE, A.ORD, A.REG_DT, A.REGUSERID FROM TB_FILE A ,TB_FILEGRP B WHERE 1=1 AND A.FILEGRPID = B.FILEGRPID AND A.FILEGRPID = (SELECT FILEGRPID FROM TB_FILE WHERE FILEID = #{fileid}) AND A.FILEID != #{fileid}
